paper.title: STUDYING PECULIARITIES OF UKRAINIAN BANKING SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT BY MEANS OF APPLYING KOHONEN MAP
paper.abstract: The article presents the results of the analysis of the banks' financial state by means of the neural network model of clusterization - the Kohonen map. As a result of grouping the banks with similar characteristics the author determines five directions for the development, each of them is related to specific risk profiles and certain management strategies.

domain_result.justification: 该论文使用Kohonen地图对银行的财务状况进行聚类分析，并识别出与特定风险概况相关的五个发展方向，这直接涉及金融风险管理中的风险识别和分类。
